judges: Before Stern, C. J., Stearne, Jones, Chidsey, Müsmanno and Arnold, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The decree is affirmed on the opinion of President Judge Henninger. Costs to be paid by appellants.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Harry Shapiro, with him Buts, Hudders, Tqillman & Rupp, for appellants.
E. O. Scoblionko, with him Scoblionko & Frank, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Lowengrub, Appellant, v. Meislin.
Argued November 23, 1953.
Before Stern, C. J., Stearne, Jones, Chidsey, Müsmanno and Arnold, JJ.
Harry Shapiro, with him Buts, Hudders, Tqillman & Rupp, for appellants.
E. O. Scoblionko, with him Scoblionko & Frank, for appellees.
March 22, 1954:
